yaml.dashboard:
title: My Awesome Home
views:
  - title: Home
    cards:
      - type: vertical-stack
        cards:
          - type: entity
            entity: input_text.text4
            name: "Winter/Summer : W/S"
          - type: entities
            entities:
              - entity: input_text.text1
                name: 'programmazione temperature  es: {"9:30": 21 , "16:30":19}'
              - entity: input_text.text2
                name: prog ACS, usare solo T=10/45 es:{"9:00":45,"16:00":10}
            title: "programma temperature minime desiderate "
          - type: entities
            entities:
              - entity: input_button.start_progservice
              - entity: input_button.stop_progservice
          - type: entity
            entity: sensor.pgmrun
      - type: custom:dual-gauge-card
        title: T
        min: 10
        max: 40
        outer:
          entity: sensor.shelly_ht_temp
          label: reale
          unit: null
        inner:
          entity: sensor.destemp
          label: prog.
          unit: null
        colors:
          - color: var(--label-badge-red)
            value: 23
          - color: var(--label-badge-green)
            value: 19
          - color: var(--label-badge-yellow)
            value: 21
          - color: var(--label-badge-blue)
            value: 0
          - color: var(--paper-blue-400)
            value: 10
      - type: vertical-stack
        cards:
          - type: entities
            entities:
              - entity: switch.rssi
                name: clima
              - entity: switch.acssw
                name: caldaia e acs
            title: Comando Accensione Climatizzazione
            show_header_toggle: false
      - type: horizontal-stack
        cards:
          - type: entities
            entities:
              - entity: input_button.setmanual_rssi_on_but
                name: condizionamento ON
              - entity: input_button.setmanual_rssi_off_but
                name: Condizionamento OFF
              - entity: input_button.setmanual_acs_on_but
                name: ACS ON
              - entity: input_button.setmanual_acs_off_but
                name: ACS OFF
          - type: entity
            entity: input_number.hour
            name: per le prossime ore
      - type: thermostat
        entity: climate.termostato_locale
        name: Manual Thermostat
  - title: Ottimizzatore FV
    path: ottimizzatore-fv
    badges: []
    cards:
      - type: vertical-stack
        cards:
          - type: entities
            entities:
              - entity: input_button.start_savingservice
                name: Start Optimizor
              - entity: input_button.stop_savingservice
                name: Stop Optimizor
            title: start/stop Optimizator
          - type: gauge
            entity: input_number.box1
            name: Potenza Anticipo Consumi
          - type: entity
            entity: sensor.opirun
            name: Current State Optimizor
      - type: vertical-stack
        cards:
          - type: entity
            entity: sensor.pgmrun
            name: Programming Service Status
            state_color: true
          - type: entities
            entities:
              - entity: text.optimizing_fv
                name: "Stato Corrente Promozione Anticipo Consumi "
                secondary_info: last-changed
          - type: gauge
            entity: sensor.battery
            name: Battery Savings
            needle: false
  - title: fv
    path: fv
    badges: []
    cards:
      - type: gauge
        min: 0
        max: 5
        name: Inverter Power kW
        entity: sensor.inverter
      - type: gauge
        entity: sensor.battery
        max: 100
        name: Battery %
      - graph: line
        type: sensor
        entity: sensor.battery
        detail: 2
        name: battery
        unit: "%"
      - type: history-graph
        entities:
          - entity: weather.forecast_home
          - entity: sensor.inverter
          - entity: sensor.battery
          - entity: text.optimizing_fv
          - entity: switch.rssi
        title: Optimizing History
yaml.package:
automation anticipate:
  - alias: fv3_cmd_startAnticipate
    id: anticipate
    initial_state: true
    trigger:
      - platform: state
        entity_id: input_button.start_ensavings
    condition: null
    action:
      - event: ws_fv3_cmd_startAnticipate
        event_data:
          state: fired
input_text:
  optimizing_fv:
    name: optimizing_fv_
    initial: "0"
  opirun:
    name: opirun_
    initial: "0"
  prgrun:
    name: pgmrun_
    initial: "0"
automation rssi:
  - alias: ws
    id: ws_
    trigger:
      - platform: event
        event_type: ws_event
        event_data:
          data: "1"
    condition: null
    action:
      - service: switch.turn_off
        data:
          entity_id: switch.rssi
  - alias: setmanual_rssi_on
    id: setmanual_rssi_on
    initial_state: true
    trigger:
      - platform: state
        entity_id: input_button.setmanual_rssi_on_but
    condition: null
    action:
      - event: ws_setmanual_rssi_on
        event_data:
          state: fired
  - alias: setmanual_rssi_off
    id: setmanual_rssi_off
    initial_state: true
    trigger:
      - platform: state
        entity_id: input_button.setmanual_rssi_off_but
    condition: null
    action:
      - event: ws_setmanual_rssi_off
        event_data:
          state: fired
input_button:
  setmanual_rssi_on_but:
    name: setmanual_rssi_on_but
    icon: mdi:bell
  setmanual_rssi_off_but:
    name: setmanual_rssi_off_but
    icon: mdi:bell
  start_savingservice:
    name: start_optimazing_service
    icon: mdi:bell
  stop_savingservice:
    name: stop_optimazing_service
    icon: mdi:bell
  start_progservice:
    name: start_programming_service
    icon: mdi:bell
  stop_progservice:
    name: stop_programming_service
    icon: mdi:bell
  setmanual_acs_on_but:
    name: setmanual_acs_on_but
    icon: mdi:bell
  setmanual_acs_off_but:
    name: setmanual_acs_off_but
    icon: mdi:bell
climate:
  - platform: generic_thermostat
    name: termostato_locale
    heater: switch.rssi
    target_sensor: sensor.shelly_ht_temp
    min_temp: 10
    max_temp: 21
    ac_mode: false
    target_temp: 17
    cold_tolerance: 0.4
    hot_tolerance: 0
    min_cycle_duration:
      seconds: 30
    initial_hvac_mode: off
    away_temp: 16
automation interface:
  - alias: startoptimizing_service
    id: strantserv
    initial_state: true
    trigger:
      - platform: state
        entity_id: input_button.start_savingservice
    condition: "{{ states.sensor.opirun.state == 'OFF'}}"
    action:
      - event: ws_startoptimizing_service
        event_data:
          state: fired
  - alias: stopoptimizing_service
    id: stopantserv
    initial_state: true
    trigger:
      - platform: state
        entity_id: input_button.stop_savingservice
    condition: "{{ states.sensor.opirun.state == 'ON'}}"
    action:
      - event: ws_stopoptimizing_service
        event_data:
          state: fired
  - alias: startprogramming_service
    id: strpgmserv
    initial_state: true
    trigger:
      - platform: state
        entity_id: input_button.start_progservice
    condition: "{{ states.sensor.pgmrun.state == 'OFF'}}"
    action:
      - event: ws_startprogramming_service
        event_data:
          state: fired
  - alias: stopprogramming_service
    id: stoppgmserv
    initial_state: true
    trigger:
      - platform: state
        entity_id: input_button.stop_progservice
    condition: "{{ states.sensor.pgmrun.state == 'ON'}}"
    action:
      - event: ws_stopprogramming_service
        event_data:
          state: fired
automation sensor:
  - alias: setmanual_acs_on
    id: setmanual_acs_on
    initial_state: true
    trigger:
      - platform: state
        entity_id: input_button.setmanual_acs_on_but
    condition: null
    action:
      - event: ws_setmanual_acs_on
        event_data:
          state: fired
  - alias: setmanual_acs_off
    id: setmanual_acs_off
    initial_state: true
    trigger:
      - platform: state
        entity_id: input_button.setmanual_acs_off_but
    condition: null
    action:
      - event: ws_setmanual_acs_off
        event_data:
          state: fired
